info.title: My API
info.description: This is a simple API for demonstration purposes

post.description: Authenticates a user and returns a JWT token if successful.

message.example: Email not verified. Please verify your email.

post.description: Register a new user and send email verification link

201.description: User successfully registered and email verification link sent

message.example: User registered successfully! Please check your email for the verification link.

post.description: Create or update franchisor details for a given user in multiple steps.

search_franchisor.description: The franchisor search ID, 0 for new franchisor

franchise_name.description: The name of the franchise if creating a new one

franchise_location.description: The location of the franchise if creating a new one

support_type.description: Type of support provided by the franchisor

hashtag_ids.description: List of hashtag IDs related to the franchisor

201.description: Franchisor details successfully stored or updated

422.description: Validation error, missing or incorrect data

400.description: Failed to create or update franchisor details

post.description:
This endpoint stores or updates franchisee details. It handles three steps:
     *     step 1 for basic franchisee details, step 2 for additional franchisee details, and step 3 for hashtags.

201.description: Franchisee details successfully stored or updated

400.description: Bad request, failed to store or update franchisee details

422.description: Validation error in the request body

post.description: This endpoint stores or updates buyer details. It handles three steps: step 1 for franchise categories, step 2 for additional details, and step 3 for hashtags.

201.description: Buyer details successfully stored or updated

400.description: Bad request, failed to store or update buyer details

422.description: Validation error in the request body

post.description: This endpoint stores or updates consultant details. It handles step 2 for services, experience, and franchise, and step 3 for hashtags.

201.description: Consultant details successfully stored or updated

400.description: Bad request, failed to store or update consultant details

422.description: Validation error in the request body

get.description: Fetches the details from the signup flow for a specific user by user_id. Requires authentication.

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: The ID of the user to fetch the signup flow details for.

message.example: get Signup Flow Details fetched successfully!

400.description: Failed to fetch Signup Flow Details

get.description: A simple test endpoint to verify Swagger integration
Verify the user's email address by checking the hash. If the email is already verified, return a message. If verification is successful, log the user in and return an authentication token.

400.description: Invalid verification link or failed verification

delete.description: This endpoint marks a Category as deleted by setting the `is_deleted` field to `1`. It does not remove the Category from the database.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the Category to be deleted

delete.description: This endpoint marks a franchise as deleted by setting the `is_deleted` field to `1`. It does not remove the franchise from the database.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the franchise to be deleted
